name: v1_validatephone
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool validate_phone_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Check whether a phone number is valid and get its metadata. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/validatephone.
API description: API Ninjas Validate Phone API endpoint. Returns metadata (including whether it is valid) for a given phone number.

number.description: The phone number to validate. If `country` is not specified, the phone number must include the 3-digit country code prefix.

country.description: The 2-letter ISO-3166 country code corresponding to the phone number.
